detectors.description: Variable Oriox._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Oriox.sol#47) is not in mixedCase

Oriox.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Oriox.sol#57-65) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Oriox.sol#61)

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Oriox.sol#20)
